greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Semiprimes in second spoke of a hexagonal spiral (A056106).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: {a(n)} = {3*n^2 - n + 1 iff semiprime}. {a(n)} = A056106 INTERSECT A001358.
example: A056106(4) = 45 = 3^2 * 5 is not in the sequence, as it is a 3-almost prime.
A056106(5) = 3*5^2 - 5 + 1 = 71 is not in the sequence, as it is a prime.
xref: Semiprimes in other spokes: A113519, A113525, A113527, A113528, A113530.
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, Jan 12 2006
